data.message: Lia I love you are bold to say ur likes nd hates. I cool with you Love Ya lol

replies.message: Like I keep saying, the dude may have skills but beating on women even joking?  Not cool.  We all have mothers, sorry he had a bad one but he has a daughter!! Thanks even if you don't agree with me!!  I gotta speak my mind like Azealia! He'll never know what it's like to be African American no matter how much he raps.
AFRICAN AMERICAN.?????????? HELLOOOOO!!!!!!!.its  so irrelevant .....its a worldwide problem for women  who are being abused ......
+  EMINEM .....would never touch a woman these are WORDS not ACTIONS....
Then he should not glorify these actions to impressionable kids, and he did beat his wife.  But yes, abuse of women is a bigger problem than he.
